summary: The Securing our Border Act focuses on border security measures. It proposes reprogramming unobligated IRS enforcement funds for nonintrusive inspection systems and border wall construction. It allocates a portion of the funds to U.S. Customs and Border Protection for non-intrusive scanning by February 6, 2034. Another portion is directed towards border wall construction. The bill also authorizes recruitment, retention, and relocation bonuses for U.S. Customs and Border Protection agents and modifies the handling of aliens arriving from contiguous territories.
